DataListSpec.Name: BPAlerting - Running Business Processes
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing running business processes.
DataListSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_BP_RUNNINGBUSINESSPROCESSES as set nocount on;
SELECT bp.BUSPROCTYPEID as BUSPROCTYPEID, bp.BUSPROCTYPE as BUSPROCTYPE, bp.BUSPROCNAME as BUSPROCNAME, bp.STARTEDON as STARTEDON, bp.ENDEDON as ENDEDON, DATEDIFF(SECOND, bp.STARTEDON, getDATE()) as DURATION, bp.STATUS as STATUS, bp.NUMBERPROCESSED as NUMBERPROCESSED, bp.NUMBEREXCEPTIONS as NUMBEREXCEPTIONS, bp.ERRORMESSAGE as ERRORMESSAGE, stat.RUNTIMEMEAN as RUNTIMEMEAN, stat.RUNTIMESTDDEV + stat.RUNTIMEMEAN as RUNTIMESTDDEV FROM (SELECT BUSPROCTYPEID, BUSPROCTYPE, BUSPROCNAME, STARTEDON, ENDEDON, NUMBERPROCESSED, NUMBEREXCEPTIONS, ERRORMESSAGE, STATUS FROM dbo.USR_V_BP_BUSINESSPROCESS WHERE STATUS = 'Running') bp LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.USR_BP_BUSINESSPROC_CUMMSTATS stat ON bp.BUSPROCTYPEID = stat.BUSPROCTYPEID AND bp.BUSPROCTYPE = stat.BUSPROCTYPENAME AND bp.BUSPROCNAME = stat.BUSPROCNAME
